bibl.title: Wine for the Christians in Early Islamic Susita (Hippos of the Decapolis).
Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.note: International Hippos Project, Polish exploration of the so-called North-west Church and its annexes, 2000-2009. Jars illustrating two distinct types (sixth-to-seventh centuries and Umayyad period).
